classdef.name: EssentialGraphicsUtils
classdef.shortdesc: Supports installing and importing Motion Graphics Templates

parameter.name: subFolderPath
parameter.shortdesc: Install a Motion Graphics Template (MOGRT) to the default location. On win that's e.g. C:\Users\[username]\AppData\Roaming\Adobe\Common\Motion Graphics Templates . When the argument subFolderPath isn't empty a folder of that name will be created and the MOGRT will be copied to that folder.

parameter.name: sourcePath
parameter.shortdesc: Check if the input Mogrt was authored in AE

then the output file name will be generated based on the comp path.

datatype.type: All images from the containing folder with the same extension will be added to the output file.:string

parameter.shortdesc: Adds an image sequence to the batch. The images will be sorted in alphabetical order. ### TODO: Add support for AMEBatchItemCreationFailedEvent and call ReportError.

datatype.type: File path of a media source.:string
Either a preset or a format input must be present. If no preset is used then the default preset of the specified format will be applied.:string

parameter.name: then the output file name will be generated based on the file path.
parameter.shortdesc: Adds a file to the batch and returns an EncoderWrapper object. ### TODO: Call ReportError when AMEBatch::VerifyScriptArguments fails (also for all other API's which use AMEBatch::VerifyScriptArguments).

parameter.name: sourcePath
parameter.shortdesc: Adds a media source to the batch. ### TODO: It's also possible to use a PPro or AE project as source. In these cases we display a dialog for choosing a sequence resp. compwhich is bad for automated scripting workflows. We should return an error that these projects aren't supported. We have other API's for PPro sequences resp. AE comps.We should also verify the behavior for Ch and Au projects. Also add support for AMEBatchItemCreationFailedEvent and call ReportError.

datatype.type: Team Projects URL or Team Projects Snap. You can create a tp2snap file in PPro for a ProjectItem via the scripting API saveProjectSnapshot.:string

parameter.shortdesc: Returns a SourceMediaInfo object. ### TODO: Unfortunately this API only works the very first time. All subsequent calls ignorethe sourcePath and return the SourceMediaInfo which has been created during the very first call.

parameter.name: arg1
parameter.shortdesc: Remove all batch items from the queue. Returns true in case of success. ### TODO: The method ExporterScriptObject::RemoveAllBatchItems is ugly and should be improved.We should better call Batch::RemoveAllBatchItems() but this method is identical with ExporterScriptObject::RemoveAllBatchItems.So the proper solution would be to clean up Batch::RemoveAllBatchItems() and provide dvacore::Result when sth. failed and call Batch::RemoveAllBatchItems() from ExporterScriptObject::RemoveAllBatchItems.

classdef.name: AMEExportEvent
classdef.shortdesc: Provides the following event types: onMediaInfoCreated, onBatchItemStatusChanged, onItemEncodingStarted, onAudioPreEncodeProgress, onEncodingItemProgressUpdated, onEncodeComplete, onError, onPostProcessListInitialized

property.name: oEncodingItemProgressUpdated
property.shortdesc: Notify the encoding progress (Deprecated).

property.name: onAudioPreEncodeProgress
property.shortdesc: Notify when the audio pre-encode progress changes (available since 24.0)

property.name: onBatchItemStatusChanged
property.shortdesc: Notify when batch item status has been changed. You can call the API's groupIndex itemIndex and status for more info.

property.name: onEncodeComplete
property.shortdesc: Notify when the batch item has been encoded. You can call the API's encodeCompleteStatus and encodeCompleteTime for more info.

property.name: onEncodingItemProgressUpdated
property.shortdesc: Notify the encoding progress.

property.name: onError
property.shortdesc: Notify when there's an error while encoding the batch item.

property.name: onItemEncodingStarted
property.shortdesc: Notify when the encoding of a batch item has started.

property.name: onMediaInfoCreated
property.shortdesc: Notify when media info has been created.

property.name: onPostProcessListInitialized
property.shortdesc: Notify when the post process list is initialized.

property.name: audioInfo
property.shortdesc: Returns the audio pre-encoding info for the event type onAudioPreEncodeProgress (available since 24.0).

property.name: audioProgress
property.shortdesc: Returns the audio pre-encoding progress for the event type onAudioPreEncodeProgress (available since 24.0).

property.name: encodeCompleteStatus
property.shortdesc: Returns true after encoding has been completed for a batch item. Can be called for onEncodeComplete event.

property.name: encodeCompleteTime
property.shortdesc: Returns the encoding time in milliseconds. Can be called for onEncodeComplete event.

property.name: error
property.shortdesc: Returns export error string (available since 25.2).

property.name: groupIndex
property.shortdesc: Returns the batch group index. Can be called for onBatchItemStatusChanged event.

property.name: itemIndex
property.shortdesc: Returns the batch item index. Can be called for onBatchItemStatusChanged event.

property.name: progress
property.shortdesc: Returns the batch item encoding progress value which is between 0 and 1. Can be called for onEncodingItemProgressUpdated event

For PNGs the epsilon value should be an integer for comparing 8-bit or 15|16-bit integer values. For VFRaw files the epsilon value should be a float for comparing float values in the nominal [0.0 .. 1.0] range.

classdef.name: EncoderHostWrapperEvent
classdef.shortdesc: Provides the following event types for items in the batch queue: onItemEncodingStarted, onAudioPreEncodeProgress, onEncodingItemProgressUpdate, onItemEncodeComplete.For multiple batch items in the queue we recommend to use this event to ensure that the event types will be received for all batch items.It provides the following event type for the whole batch queue: onBatchEncoderStatusChanged.

property.name: onAudioPreEncodeProgress
property.shortdesc: Notify when the audio pre-encode progress changes (available since 24.0).

property.name: onBatchEncoderStatusChanged
property.shortdesc: Notify when the batch encoder status has changed. Get the new status from the batchEncoderStatus property. (available since 23.3)

property.name: onEncodingItemProgressUpdate
property.shortdesc: Notify of the batch item encoding progress (available since 23.1).

property.name: onItemEncodeComplete
property.shortdesc: Notify when the batch item has been encoded.

property.name: onItemEncodingStarted
property.shortdesc: Notify when the batch item encoding started (available since 23.1).

property.name: audioInfo
property.shortdesc: Returns the audio pre-encoding info for the event type onAudioPreEncodeProgress (available since 24.0).

property.name: audioProgress
property.shortdesc: Returns the audio pre-encoding progress for the event type onAudioPreEncodeProgress (available since 24.0).

property.name: outputFilePath
property.shortdesc: Returns the path of the output file. Can be called for onItemEncodingStarted and onItemEncodeComplete events.

property.name: progress
property.shortdesc: Returns the encoding progress between 0 and 1. Can be called for onEncodingItemProgressUpdate event.

property.name: result
property.shortdesc: Returns the encoding result 'True' or 'False'. Can be called for onItemEncodeComplete event.

property.name: sourceFilePath
property.shortdesc: Returns the path of the source file. Can be called for onItemEncodingStarted and onItemEncodeComplete events.

parameter.name: arg1
parameter.shortdesc: Pauses the batch (always returns true). ### Todo: Do we want to return a result when e.g. the batch was already paused or something went wrong?

parameter.name: arg1
parameter.shortdesc: Runs the batch (always returns true). ### Todo: Do we want to return a result when e.g. the batch was already running or something went wrong?

parameter.name: arg1
parameter.shortdesc: Stops the batch (always returns true). ### Todo: Do we want to return a result when e.g. the batch was already stopped or something went wrong?

method.shortdesc: Creates a GenExtend Job object

method.name: getGenExtendJobErrorMessage
method.shortdesc: Gets the error message for Generative Extend job failure

method.name: getGenExtendJobProgress
method.shortdesc: Gets the progress item for Generative Extend Job

classdef.name: TranscoderEvent
classdef.shortdesc: Transcoder event object

property.name: EVENT_DESTINATIONSELECTED
property.shortdesc: A new (publish) destination was selected.

property.name: EVENT_DISKSPACEREQUIREMENTCHANGED
property.shortdesc: Exported File size needs an update.

property.name: EVENT_EXPORTWORKAREACHANGED
property.shortdesc: The export range option changed.

property.name: EVENT_FORMATCHANGED
property.shortdesc: The export format has changed.

property.name: EVENT_NEWEVENTGENERATED
property.shortdesc: A new event is generated

property.name: EVENT_OUTPUTFILENAMECHANGED
property.shortdesc: The output filename has changed and needs to be updated.

property.name: EVENT_SELECTNEWPRESET
property.shortdesc: A new preset is selected.

property.name: EVENT_SHOWEXPORTWARNING
property.shortdesc: Export Warning should be displayed. EventInfo contains the warning message.

property.name: EVENT_UPDATEALLSETTINGS
property.shortdesc: Settings changed and all settings needs to be updated.

property.name: EVENT_UPDATEDEPENDENCIES
property.shortdesc: One Parameter or Parameter Group changed. EventInfo contains the changed parameter ID.

property.name: eventInfo
property.shortdesc: Additional info as string or JSON if required by this event. Otherwise empty.

classdef.name: Transcoder
classdef.shortdesc: The Transcoder object provides the main access for full export settings information and control.

property.name: colorManagementInfo
property.shortdesc: Returns color management info.

property.name: currentDestination
property.shortdesc: Returns the JSON for the current selected destination.

property.name: currentDestinationIsLoggedIn
property.shortdesc: Returns the logged-in state of the current selected destination. Returns 'false' if we can't determine logged-in state (MediaFile CreativeCloud FTP).

property.name: currentPresetSettingsGroups
property.shortdesc: Returns the list and names of the current Preset Setting Groups.

property.name: currentSourceMasterClips
property.shortdesc: Get the currently selected source masterclip(s).

property.name: currentSourceSequence
property.shortdesc: Get the currently selected source sequence.

property.name: destinations
property.shortdesc: Returns a JSON list of all destinations for an export.

property.name: estimatedFileSize
property.shortdesc: Returns the calculated file size information for the current source with the selected Preset.

property.name: exportDestinationsDirect
property.shortdesc: Start a direct modal Export with all for export marked destinations of the current Transcoder settings.

property.name: exportDirect
property.shortdesc: Start a direct modal Export with the current Transcoder settings.

property.name: getJSONConvertOptionIncludeHiddenParams
property.shortdesc: Returns the current JSON convert option for hide hidden params.

property.name: getJSONConvertOptionIncludeUnsetValues
property.shortdesc: Returns the current JSON convert option for hide unset values.

property.name: importIntoProject
property.shortdesc: Returns the import into Project preference value.

property.name: isMatchSequenceSettingsAllowed
property.shortdesc: Check if match Sequence settings are allowed.

property.name: isOutputFilePathLocked
property.shortdesc: Returns the locked status of the output file.

property.name: matchSequenceSettings
property.shortdesc: Returns the match Sequence settings value.

property.name: originPresetHasEnabledPublishGroups
property.shortdesc: Check if the original applied preset contains any enabled publish settings. Publish settings will be controlled by the destination settings which overwrites any original preset publish settings.

property.name: outputFilePath
property.shortdesc: Returns the path to the output file.

property.name: presetActionsGroupSettings
property.shortdesc: Returns the current selected Preset Actions Settings.

property.name: presetAudioGroupSettings
property.shortdesc: Returns the current selected Preset Audio Settings.

property.name: presetCaptionGroupSettings
property.shortdesc: Returns the current selected Preset Caption Settings.

property.name: presetEffectsGroupSettings
property.shortdesc: Returns the current selected Preset Effects Settings.

property.name: presetIngestGroupSettings
property.shortdesc: Returns the current selected Preset Ingest Settings.

property.name: presetMetadataGroupSettings
property.shortdesc: Returns the current selected Preset Metadata Settings.

property.name: presetPublishGroupSettings
property.shortdesc: Returns the current selected Preset Publish Settings.

property.name: presetVideoGroupSettings
property.shortdesc: Returns the current selected Preset Video Settings.

property.name: sourceSelection
property.shortdesc: Returns a JSON list of the current selected source object.

parameter.name: newFormat
parameter.shortdesc: Change the export format selected preset will be reset to the default preset for a given format.

parameter.name: value
parameter.shortdesc: Change match source state for the given Parameter.

parameter.name: value
parameter.shortdesc: Change an existing Parameter.

parameter.name: includeSettings
parameter.shortdesc: Returns the information about the current selected Preset.

parameter.name: groupKey
parameter.shortdesc: Returns the current selected Preset settings from a special group.

parameter.name: presetComments
parameter.shortdesc: Export the current Preset.

method.name: getAspectRatioLock
method.shortdesc: Get the aspect ratio lock state.

method.name: hasContentCredentials
method.shortdesc: Returns true if the current selection (sequence or project items) contains content credentials.

method.name: isExportCRActivated
method.shortdesc: Returns true if the export of content credentials (cr) is activated

method.name: isFormatSupportedByCR
method.shortdesc: Returns true if the export format is supported by content credentials (cr)

parameter.name: extension
parameter.shortdesc: Returns the full path to a selected file

parameter.name: fullPathWithExtension
parameter.shortdesc: Returns the full path to a selected file

parameter.name: savePublishSettings
parameter.shortdesc: Save custom preset.

parameter.name: groupIndex
parameter.shortdesc: Select a new destination.

parameter.name: value
parameter.shortdesc: Set the aspect ratio lock state.

parameter.name: presetID
parameter.shortdesc: Set currently selected Preset.

parameter.name: customData
parameter.shortdesc: Set new Custom Data to the destination to store plugin or UI related information for this destination as JSON.

parameter.name: importExportedFile
parameter.shortdesc: Set the import into Project preference value.

parameter.name: includeUnsetValues
parameter.shortdesc: Set the JSON return parameter for this class. Hide Hidden doesn't expose not UI visible params. Hide Unset returns smaller JSON by not exposing the parameter when set to default (e.g. disable = false will not expose but disable = true will). Will return true then an options has changed.

parameter.name: matchSequenceSettings
parameter.shortdesc: Set the Sequence settings as Preset.

parameter.name: createUniqueFilename
parameter.shortdesc: Set the new path to the output file. The filename can be made unique based on other files already on disk.

parameter.name: rangeOption
parameter.shortdesc: Set the current Range Option: Entire(0) InToOut(1) WorkArea(2) Custom(3) Default(4).

parameter.name: scalingOption
parameter.shortdesc: Set the current Scaling Option: Scale to fit(0) Scale to fill(3) Stretch to fill(5).

parameter.name: filePath
parameter.shortdesc: Returns output filepath collision type for a given filepath. There could be no collision collision with another destination or collision with existing file on disk.

method.name: willSignWithContentCredentials
method.shortdesc: Returns true if the current selection (sequence or project items) will be signed with content credentials.

classdef.name: FilterModule
classdef.shortdesc: A filter (audio/video) of a project

parameter.name: object
parameter.shortdesc: Cast an object to FilterModule. In case the provided object can be used as FilterModule a corresponding object is returned. Otherwise an exception is thrown.

parameter.name: object

property.name: matchName
property.shortdesc: Returns the internal matchname for the filter

property.name: mediaType
property.shortdesc: Returns the media type guid for the filter object

classdef.name: Console
classdef.shortdesc: The Console object provides access to the DVA console.

parameter.name: command

classdef.name: MediaBrowser
classdef.shortdesc: Scripting interfaces to Media Browser. Can be used to make and/or cancel thumbnail and project item requests.

method.name: cancelProjectItemRequests
method.shortdesc: Cancel all outstanding project item requests. Typical use would be changing directories while metadata is still being retrieved for items in the previous directory.

method.name: cancelThumbnailRequests
method.shortdesc: Cancel all outstanding thumbnail requests. Typical use would be changing directories while thumbnails are still being retrieved for items in the previous directory.

classdef.name: MedianFilter
classdef.shortdesc: Stateless scripting object for the Median Filter algorithm

parameter.name: kernelSize
parameter.shortdesc: Performs median filtering on an input vector. The kernel size must be a positive integer. Border values are padded with zeros. Using a kernel size of 1 will return the input vector unchanged. Values lower than 1 will throw an exception.

parameter.name: kernelSize
parameter.shortdesc: Performs component wise median filtering on an input matrix that is interpreted as col major vectors. Border values are padded with zeros. The kernel size must be a positive integer. Using a kernel size of 1 will return the input matrix unchanged. Values lower then 1 will throw an exception.

classdef.name: StockWranglerParameter
classdef.shortdesc: Script object for stock wrangler search parameters.

property.name: params
property.shortdesc: Stock Wrangler search parameters

property.name: bpmMax
property.shortdesc: Set the max bpm .Next search will only have results below this tempo.

property.name: bpmMin
property.shortdesc: Set the min bpm. Next search will only have results above this tempo

property.name: categories
property.shortdesc: Set the categories.Next search will only have results that fall within the supplied categories

property.name: durationMax
property.shortdesc: Set the max duration.Next search will only have results below this duration.

property.name: durationMin
property.shortdesc: Set the min duration.Next search will only have results above this duration

property.name: genres
property.shortdesc: Set the genres.Next search will only have results that fall within the supplied genres

property.name: includeAssetsWithoutBPM
property.shortdesc: Set boolean to search for assets regardless of BPM.Next search will have results containing assets without BPM if true.

property.name: moods
property.shortdesc: Set the moods.Next search will only have results that fall within the supplied moods

parameter.name: params
parameter.shortdesc: start a music search using the parameters in the Parameter object

classdef.name: ObjectReflection
classdef.shortdesc: The ObjectReflection object provides information about the behavior of an object.

parameter.name: object to inspect
parameter.shortdesc: Construct ObjectReflection object for given object.

parameter.name: namespaces
parameter.shortdesc: Retrieve object reflections for given namespace settings. Optionally pass in an Object where each property name is a namespace name with the value true or false for visible or excluded.

parameter.name: namespaces
parameter.shortdesc: Retrieve third party object reflections for given namespace settings. Optionally pass in an Object where each property name is a namespace name with the value true or false for visible or excluded.

property.name: classProperties
property.shortdesc: The object class properties.

property.name: description
property.shortdesc: The object class description.

property.name: eventObject
property.shortdesc: true if the object is an event object.

property.name: eventTarget
property.shortdesc: true if the object is an event target object.

property.name: instanceProperties
property.shortdesc: The object instance properties.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The object class name.
